content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-link\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Walgreens Compliance Sub-Committee (“Sub-Committee”) Procedures for oversight, evaluation and reporting of Identified Overpayments.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"1. Purpose \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The purpose of this standard operating procedure (SOP) is to set forth procedures for the Walgreens Compliance Sub-Committee in its oversight, evaluation and reporting of potential overpayments related to Government Health Care Programs to ensure adherence with relevant laws and regulations, including federal and state False Claims Acts and Government Health Care Program requirements.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"2. Scope \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This SOP applies to all Walgreens Team Members in the Compliance Office, Legal Department, Healthcare Accounts Receivable, and Third-Party Operations who participate in and/or support the activities of the Compliance Sub-Committee.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"3. Definitions \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table\",\"data\":{\"cellSizes\":[343,660]},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_row\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_header_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Term\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_header_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Meaning\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_row\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Compliance Sub-Committee\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"A governance group that consists of specific leaders from Compliance, Legal, Health Care Accounts Receivable (HAR) and Operations who meet quarterly and on an as-needed basis to review outstanding Health Care Payor billing and payment compliance issues. The Compliance Sub-Committee reports to the executive Walgreens Compliance Steering Committee.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_row\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Health Care Accounts Receivable (HAR)\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Walgreens department responsible for the \\roversight and processing of Health Care Accounts Receivable.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_row\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Government Health Care Program\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Any plan or program providing health care benefits that is funded directly, in whole or in part, by the U.S. government or a state government. Such plans include, but are not limited to: \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Medicare Part B; and (2) has quantified.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_row\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Normal Course of Business\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The routine processes and procedures performed by HAR with respect to its responsibility to (1) review credit balance claims (claim balance less than $0) in the receivable to determine if there are any Identified Overpayments; (2) respond to routine External Audits; and (3) execute HAR\\u0002documented procedures to refund the Identified Overpayments found.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_row\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Substantial Overpayment\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"An Identified Overpayment in excess of $500,000. \",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_row\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Walgreens Team Member\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Any employee and/or officer of Walgreens.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"4.
